name: OnIncomingConnection
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3z R2-2 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when an IP address attempts a connection to the server. To block incoming connections, use BlockIpAddress.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player attempting to connect

params_body.name: ip_address[]
params_body.description: The IP address of the player attempting to connect

params_body.name: port
params_body.description: The port of the attempted connection

return_values:
1 - Will prevent other filterscripts from receiving this callback.

 0 - Indicates that this callback will be passed to the next filterscript.

 It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_fn:
BlockIpAddress: Block an IP address from connecting to the server for a set amount of time.
 UnBlockIpAddress: Unblock an IP that was previously blocked.
related_cb:
OnPlayerConnect: Called when a player connects to the server.
 OnPlayerDisconnect: Called when a player leaves the server.
 OnPlayerFinishedDownloading: Called when a player finishes downloading custom models.
 BlockIpAddress: Block an IP address from connecting to the server for a set amount of time.
 UnBlockIpAddress: Unblock an IP that was previously blocked.
